org.apache.flink.graph.library

类 Summarization<K,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.library.Summarization<K,VV,EV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - vertex identifier type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,VV,EV,Graph<K,Summarization.VertexValue<VV>,Summarization.EdgeValue<EV>>>

    public class Summarization<K,VV,EV>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphAlgorithm<K,VV,EV,Graph<K,Summarization.VertexValue<VV>,Summarization.EdgeValue<EV>>>
    The summarization algorithm computes a condensed version of the input graph by grouping vertices and edges based on their values. By doing this, the algorithm helps to uncover insights about patterns and distributions in the graph.

    In the resulting graph, each vertex represents a group of vertices that share the same vertex value. An edge, that connects a vertex with itself, represents all edges with the same edge value that connect vertices inside that group. An edge between vertices in the output graph represents all edges with the same edge value between members of those groups in the input graph.

    Consider the following example:

    Input graph: 

     Vertices (id, value):
 (0, "A")
 (1, "A")
 (2, "B")
 (3, "B")

 Edges (source, target, value):
 (0,1, null)
 (1,0, null)
 (1,2, null)
 (2,1, null)
 (2,3, null)
 (3,2, null)

    Output graph: 

    Vertices (id, (value, count)):
 (0, ("A", 2)) // 0 and 1
 (2, ("B", 2)) // 2 and 3

 Edges (source, target, (value, count)):
 (0, 0, (null, 2)) // (0,1) and (1,0)
 (2, 2, (null, 2)) // (2,3) and (3,2)
 (0, 2, (null, 1)) // (1,2)
 (2, 0, (null, 1)) // (2,1)

    Note that this implementation is non-deterministic in the way that it assigns identifiers to summarized vertices. However, it is guaranteed that the identifier is one of the represented vertex identifiers.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  Summarization.EdgeGroupReducer<K,EV>
      Creates a summarized edge from a group of edges.
      static class  Summarization.EdgeValue<EV>
      Value that is stored at a summarized edge.
      private static class  Summarization.SourceVertexJoinFunction<K,EV>
      Replaces the source vertex id with the vertex group representative id and adds the edge group value.
      private static class  Summarization.TargetVertexJoinFunction<K,EV>
      Replaces the target vertex id with the vertex group identifier.
      static class  Summarization.VertexGroupItem<K,VGV>
      Represents a single vertex in a vertex group.
      private static class  Summarization.VertexGroupItemToRepresentativeFilter<K,VV>
      Filter tuples that are representing a single vertex.
      private static class  Summarization.VertexGroupItemToSummarizedVertexFilter<K,VV>
      Filter tuples that are representing a vertex group.
      private static class  Summarization.VertexGroupItemToSummarizedVertexMapper<K,VV>
      Creates a new vertex representing a vertex group.
      private static class  Summarization.VertexGroupItemToVertexWithRepresentativeMapper<K,VV>
      Creates a Summarization.VertexWithRepresentative from a Summarization.VertexGroupItem.
      private static class  Summarization.VertexGroupReducer<K,VV>
      Creates one Summarization.VertexGroupItem for each group element containing the vertex identifier and the identifier of the group representative which is the first vertex in the reduce input iterable.
      static class  Summarization.VertexValue<VV>
      Value that is stored at a summarized vertex.
      static class  Summarization.VertexWithRepresentative<K>
      Represents a vertex identifier and its corresponding vertex group identifier.
